titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the signification of allegiance, as it is to be understood in the new oath of allegiance
titleStmt.author: Downes, Theophilus, d. 1726.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Theophilus Downes. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
